title: Early Access Games... Yay or Nay? # #gaming
description: Do y'all get excited about early access games?

transcript_chunks.text: top level take like what's your opinion personally on Early Access games I think it's great I I think it's the it's a proof as in the puting situation where so many of the biggest Indie releases especially or like you know nonaa releases we've gotten in the last however many years have come out as Early Access right like we go through the list of games talk about Hades we talk about balers Gate 3 you talk about dead cells I think Minecraft might have been Early Access at first right like a lot of the biggest and best games that we've had in the last I'll would say decade have started off in Early Access
